archimate:BusinessService.name: Service Affecting SOGP Compliance
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
The organization creates architectures to deliver services. A service will positively impact an SOGP Topic if the predefined Stubs/Statements are adhered to while defining the Controls. Deviation from these Stubs/Statements results in a negative impact on the Topic realization and any other referenced standard.
This service element is only meant to be a an example in the meta modelling structure view.
